title: The Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) Model
dialog: Welcome! In this level we are diving into the OSI Model's layers. Each layer plays a specific role in data communication,

title: The Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) Model
dialog: like a team working together to build a network. Let's uncover the essence of each layer.

title: Physical Layer
dialog: Transmits raw bit stream over the physical medium.

title: Data Link Layer
dialog: Defines the format of data on the network.

title: Network Layer
dialog: Decides which physical path that data will take.

title: Transport Layer
dialog: Transmits data using transmission protocols including TCP and UDP

title: Session Layer
dialog: Establishes, maintains, and terminates connections between devices.

title: Presentation Layer
dialog: Ensures that data is in usable format and is where data encryption occurs.

title: Application Layer
dialog: Provides network services directly to end-users and applications.
